name: Which Way (AlexWallace)
description:
WASD / Arrow keys to move

Space - Drop block

(Late) Submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2020! This is the first game I have made with Unity and was glad to be able to use the jam for this experience.

Theme: Out Of Control

I wanted to make something that I knew I could feasibly make in Unity so I went with a simple top down puzzle game where you use 'control blocks' to help direct your little monster friend back home. 

The challenge here was making the blocks must be interactive, movable and contextual to the matching base they would be placed in. This meant a lot of messy code which I'm rather proud of but know would make anyone with the slightest idea of how to use C# wince.

Anyway, hope you enjoy what I've made. I'll come back here at some point to write a more in depth analysis of my experience this over the game jam period.
